definitions.definition: A hypothetical future (counterpart or continuation of the) Internet , created by the convergence of virtually enhanced physical reality and physically persistent virtual space.
A set or the composite of all universes .

main_definition: ( science fiction , Internet , computing ) A hypothetical future (counterpart or continuation of the) Internet , created by the convergence of virtually enhanced physical reality and physically persistent virtual space.
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) A set or the composite of all universes .
